document.full_text: a planned meeting was to take place the same day that security forces fired on protesters marching through the capital, sana. at least 15 protesters were shot, doctors said.
document.title: yemeni opposition sets meeting with gulf bloc
lines_and_colors: a planned meeting was to take place the same day that security forces fired on protesters marching through the capital, sana. at least 15 protesters were shot, doctors said.
